alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:09PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pennington County through 145 PM MDT... At 109 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northwest of Reptile Gardens, or 4 miles southwest of Rapid City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rapid Valley, Black Gap and Hart Ranch around 120 PM MDT. Rapid City Airport around 125 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Caputa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City
